#line 46 "inweb/Tests/Test Cases/twinprimes.inweb"
int isprime(int n) {
	if (n <= 1) return FALSE;
	for (int m = 2; m*m <= n; m++)
		if (n % m == 0)
			return FALSE;
	return TRUE;
}
